fallbackNotice: 目前暫以英文內容呈現，完整翻譯即將補上。

packages.name: 入門 — 3 次會談
packages.scope: 每次會談之間 1 個小實驗；CV／LinkedIn 以英國常見格式快速校正。

packages.name: 聚焦 — 6 次會談
packages.scope: 作品集／履歷重構，強化可見的證據點；面試演練聚焦清楚與適配。

packages.name: 延伸 — 12 次會談
packages.scope: 深度練習文化適配與主管對話；客製練習題與節奏回顧。

policies.title: 改期
policies.body: 需提前 24 小時；逾時視同使用一次會談。

policies.title: 頻率
policies.body: 第一堂確立節奏；套組之間可暫停。

policies.title: 保密
policies.body: 預設保密；最少必要紀錄；可要求刪除。

policies.title: 範圍
policies.body: 教練而非治療；若有需要會提供轉介資訊。

policies.title: 時差與費用
policies.body: 線上時段以英國時間為主；帳款以 GBP 計價。

checklist: I can commit 60–90min per week for tests and applications.
I accept coaching is not immigration, legal, or medical advice.
I’m willing to adapt my CV and outreach to UK hiring norms.
what_to_prepare: Current CV and two target roles (links)
Two projects to convert into UK-style bullet points
Basic outreach list (10–20 names or companies)

process.title: Process & milestones
process.description: We usually partner for eight to ten sessions across three months with optional co-working sprints.

steps.title: Map the hiring landscape
steps.description: We unpack sector norms, sponsorship realities and what evidence UK employers seek.

steps.title: Build your narrative toolkit
steps.description: We co-write scripts, portfolio stories and Q&A to use with recruiters, hiring managers and networks.

steps.title: Sustain the search
steps.description: We monitor energy, iterate weekly plans and celebrate momentum so you do not burn out.

process.note: You can add document reviews or mock interviews between sessions when deadlines appear.

sections.heading: Scope
sections.body: Coaching supports clarity and momentum for UK job search through questions and experiments.

sections.heading: Not legal/immigration/medical
sections.body: No legal or visa advice; we may signpost to professional services where appropriate.

sections.heading: Confidentiality & limits
sections.body: Sessions are confidential except where law/safety requires disclosure.

sections.heading: Consent & boundaries
sections.body: You may stop or decline any exercise at any time.

items.a: No. We do not provide immigration advice. We focus on job search strategy and practice.

items.q: Will you introduce me to companies?
items.a: We can co-design outreach but do not promise referrals. Your network building is part of the work.

cases.title: Composite coaching glimpses
cases.description: Examples anonymised across internationally trained professionals navigating the UK market.

items.title: Sponsorship status anxiety
items.context: Non-UK degree; unsure how to address visa sponsorship early.
items.coaching_moves: Built a 2-line sponsorship script; prioritised target firms by policy; planned 10-day outreach.
items.shift: Fewer ghosted threads; clearer yes/no signals faster.
items.disclaimer: Illustrative and anonymised; outcomes are not promised.

items.title: Translating overseas wins
items.context: Strong results abroad not mapping to UK bullets.
items.coaching_moves: Converted two projects to UK-style metrics; created proof links; rehearsed succinct framing.
items.shift: Hiring managers understood scope without over-explaining.
items.disclaimer: Illustrative and anonymised; outcomes are not promised.

items.title: Accent & confidence
items.context: Avoids phone screens due to accent worries.
items.coaching_moves: Practised slow-first phrasing; scripted clarifying questions; built pause habits.
items.shift: Entered calls with steadier pace and fewer rush-talk loops.
items.disclaimer: Illustrative and anonymised; outcomes are not promised.

items.title: 把海外經驗轉譯為英國職場能理解的例子與語彙。
每週節奏；兩次會談間做小實驗（資訊性聊天、試做任務、志工嘗試）。
CV／LinkedIn 調整為英國常見格式與期待；展示最近的證據點。
面試演練聚焦文化與適配；不教話術、不背模板。
簡單定價；套組之間可暫停；預設保密。
